items.sentence: When it comes to creativity, there are no winners or losers. At least, that's what they say.
When people meet, first impressions determine more than 50 percent of whatever happens next.
Tom has been without regular employment for several years, and is living from hand to mouth.
The Democrats haven't decided on their candidates yet, but in any case they're sure to lose.
You'll be able to spot Tom easily. He'll be the one carrying a duffel bag and a guitar case.
